alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 4:05AM MDT until March 25 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches on the valley floors and up to 8 inches possible on the benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. The Friday morning commute will be impacted, primarily north of Salt Lake City.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
